item.title: Android + IOIO + Countdown Timer
item.description: Countdown timer Android app with IOIO output. When the timer goes off, it pulls the pin high, or low. The article demonstrates a proof of concept usage with a single LED, but this could easily be adapted for other usages: light switches and appliance control, detonators, etc. For additional background information on interfacing Android with IOIO, check out my other introductoryÂ tutorials: Android + IOIO + Simple Digital Output
